text: Ratings declined this season, as the show shifted focus and brought on Kevin James'former ` ` King of Queens'' partner Leah Remini. A year ago, Kevin James told a reporter that his CBS sitcom, “ Kevin Can Wait, ” had killed off Erinn Hayes ’ character on the show in order to give the show a longer life. Last week, CBS canceled the sitcom after two seasons.
